subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: With goals by Eddie Johnson and Landon Donovan, the United States beat Mexico before 25,584 ecstatic fans and qualified for its seventh straight World Cup.
snippet: With goals by Eddie Johnson and Landon Donovan, the United States beat Mexico before 25,584 ecstatic fans and qualified for its seventh straight World Cup.
